component.text: Activity â€“ Placing Standard and Extended ACLs

Evaluate the network policies and determine the best placement for the ACLs. Drag and drop the ACL label to the appropriate place in the graphic.

Network Policy #1: Use a standard ACL to stop the 192.168.10.0/24 network from accessing the Internet through ISP.

Network Policy #2: Use an extended ACL to stop the 192.168.30.0/24 network from accessing the Web/TFTP Server.
You have successfully determined the placement of the standard ACL and the extended ACL based on the topology and the network policies.
You have not successfully determined the placement of the standard ACL and the extended ACL based on the topology and the network policies. Please click Reset to try again.
